description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Web Developer is responsible for building the web application
              
              - Writes design/implementation documentation
              
              - Participates in design/code reviews
              
              - Creates, units test, maintains and troubleshoots software
              
              - Creates prototype/test applications
              
              - Works with members of project teams to ensure specifications are satisfied
              
              - Provide ongoing support and maintenance of existing applications
              
              - Explore new technologies to solve technical challenges
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Must have a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or equivalent
              
              - At least 2 years’ experience as a .NET (ASP.NET) developer in the web environment
              
              - Strong experience in web application and software development using ASP.NET MVC, ADO.NET, Entity Framework, Web API, Window Service
              
              - Knowledge of object-oriented design of applications: OOP, SOLID, UML and Design Patterns
              
              - Knowledge of databases (SQL, MS SQL Server), stored procedures
              
              - Knowledge HTML5/CSS3 or HTML/XHTML/XML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery is a plus
              
              - Knowledge in Node.js is a plus
              
              - Knowledge in asp.net core is a plus
              
              - Experience in working with microservice architecture is a plus
              
              - Be willing to learn new technologies and strong team work
              
              - Excellent communication skills and the ability to work with people at every level
              
              - Must be able to perform after office-hours standby and support
              
              - Good working attitude
              
              - Good in spoken and written English and Vietnamese
              
              - Application must be willing to work in Pasay city, Philippines
              
              - Full-time position (experience candidates will be considered for senior positions)
              

              Benefit:
              
              - Medical, Dental, Vision, Meals, HMO, Non-taxable allowance, Travel Allowance, Company activities, Annual Bonus.
              
              - Salary range: 12OO - 2OOO
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Salary range: 12OO-2OOO
               







                Medical, Dental, Vision, Meals, HMO, Non-taxable allowance, Travel Allowance
               







                Company activities, Annual Bonus.
